SEARCH
Package fans.goldenglow.otpauth.service

Class TokenService

java.lang.Object
fans.goldenglow.otpauth.service.TokenService
@Service public class TokenService extends Object
Service class responsible for handling token management and verification code generation. This class provides functionality for the creation and validation of verification codes, along with generating access and refresh tokens for user authentication.

  • Constructor Details

    • TokenService

      @Autowired public TokenService(org.springframework.data.redis.core.RedisTemplate<String,VerificationCode> redisTemplate, UserService userService, SecurityService securityService)
      Constructs a TokenService instance with dependencies injected.
      Parameters:
      redisTemplate - the RedisTemplate used for handling verification code storage and retrieval
      userService - the UserService responsible for user management operations
      securityService - the SecurityService used to provide cryptographic utilities for token signing

  • Method Details

    • createVerificationCode

      public String createVerificationCode(String email)
      Creates a verification code for a given email address. If a code already exists and is within the resend threshold, no new code will be generated. Otherwise, an existing code is deleted, and a new one is generated and stored.
      Parameters:
      email - the email address for which the verification code is generated
      Returns:
      the generated verification code as a string, or null if a code already exists and is within the resend threshold

    • validateVerificationCode

      public boolean validateVerificationCode(String email, String verificationCode)
      Validates the provided verification code against the stored code associated with the given email. If the code is valid, it is removed from the storage to prevent reuse.
      Parameters:
      email - the email address associated with the verification code
      verificationCode - the verification code to be validated
      Returns:
      true if the provided verification code matches the stored code, false otherwise

    • generateTokens

      public TokenResponse generateTokens(String email)
      Generates access and refresh tokens for a user identified by their email address. This method ensures the user's existence by creating or updating the user based on the provided email. The returned tokens include an access token with profile-related scopes and a refresh token, both with predefined expiration times.
      Parameters:
      email - the email address of the user for whom the tokens are generated
      Returns:
      a TokenResponse object containing the generated access token and refresh token

    • refreshToken

      public TokenResponse refreshToken(String refreshTokenValue) throws Exception
      Refreshes and generates new access and refresh tokens using the provided refresh token. This method validates the refresh token's scope and verifies the existence of the associated user.
      Parameters:
      refreshTokenValue - the refresh token to be validated and used for generating new tokens
      Returns:
      a TokenResponse object containing the newly generated access token and refresh token
      Throws:
      Exception - if the refresh token has an invalid scope or if the associated user does not exist
